text: Mousumi Saha is an Indian actress. She acts in films of many languages. She also starred in 58 episodes of the Star Jalsha serial Khokababu, airing from 2017 as "Kaushalya Mukherjee".Khokababu serial cast & crew ==Filmography== {|class ="wikitable sortable" |- ! Films ! Year !
